settings.code:
Welcome Longevity Lifestyle Followers!

You're on the verge of unlocking a revolutionary approach to wellness, and we're excited to accompany you on this transformative journey. As highlighted by Claudia, ProLon's 5-Day Fasting Nutrition Program is not a mere product but a culmination of over two decades of extensive research.

Conducted across 14 renowned universities and spearheaded by Dr. Valter Longo—a figure celebrated as the forefather of fasting science and recognized by TIME as one of the top 50 most influential people in Health—our 5-Day Program represents innovation, dedication, and a deep commitment to enhancing well-being.
Order Now

As a thank-you for being a part of Claudia’s community, we're offering an exclusive 25% discount on your ProLon order. Use code LONGEVITYLIFESTYLE at checkout and embark on a transformational journey with us.

Are you ready to transform your daily routine?

Our Fasting Shake is not just a beverage; it's a lifestyle choice. Infused with nourishing ingredients and backed by scientific research, it's your go-to companion for a healthier, slimmer you.

We all strive to eat the cleanest premium ingredients, help our bodies perform at their best, and age slower. Fasting Shake is the latest secret bio-hack for fat burn, performance, and a longevity lifestyle, allowing you to reap the benefits of intermittent fasting without hunger!
Order Now

settings.title: ProLon Program
settings.subtitle: REJUVENATION FROM WITHIN
settings.description: Life-changing nutrition that rejuvenates cells and metabolism while protecting lean body mass.
settings.quick_view_description: ProLon was designed and clinically tested by 18 global universities to nourish your body while inducing the cellular, metabolic, and emotional benefits of prolonged fasting. In three 5-day cycles of ProLon, you can fuel your body into rejuvenation, longevity, and healthy living.

settings.title: ReSet 1-Day Kit
settings.subtitle: A ONE-DAY MIND AND BODY RESET
settings.description: A one-day all-inclusive offset, detox, and reset with fasting-mimicking nutrition.
settings.quick_view_description: ProLon ReSet provides a complete day of innovative nutrition formula that was scientifically tested and patented to feed your body while keeping it in a physiological fasting state. This Nutrition Program induces your body to breakdown fat and use it as fuel, similar to when you water fast.

settings.title: Fasting Bars
settings.subtitle: INTERMITTENT FASTING BARS
settings.description: Great breakfast that nourishes your body while keeping it in a physiological fasting state.
settings.quick_view_description:
Intermittent Fasting Bar is the only nutrition bar you can eat during your fasting window without taking you out of a fasting state.

Based on the nutrition technology of Fasting Mimicking Nutrition, and with over 20 years of research, scientists studied how unique blends of macronutrients and micronutrients could be consumed without kicking your body out of a fasting state.

settings.title: Fasting Shake
settings.subtitle: CHOCOLATE OR VANILLA
settings.description: Great breakfast shake that nourishes your body while keeping it in a physiological fasting state.
settings.quick_view_description: The best from nature, nurtured by ProLon longevity science — a breakthrough in nutrition and healthy aging science. The proprietary blend of Fasting Shake avoids triggering the body response to food, keeping it in a fasting, fat-burning state for longer!

settings.title: L-Spread
settings.subtitle: APULIAN ALMONDS & COCOA
settings.description: Made with 74% Apulian Almonds, plant-based proteins, healthy fats, and low carbs.
settings.quick_view_description:
A delicous and health minded chocolate spread! L-Spread contains 74% Apulian Almonds — almonds that are sourced from longevity areas in Italy. 

Enjoy as a daily breakfast, as a snack, desert, or spoon full!  

  • Contains 74% Alpulian Almonds
  • 0% Palm Oil
  • Rich in Vitamin E, Calcium, & Magnesium
  • Gluten-free, Dairy-free, Soy-free, Vegan
  • Plant-based, healthy fats, prebiotic fiber

settings.title: L-Pill
settings.subtitle: DAILY HEALTHY AGING
settings.description: Dual-cap technology with naturally occurring ingredients that support healthy aging of cells and organs.
settings.quick_view_description: It is a dual-cap technology that includes a high concentration of naturally occurring ingredients that were carefully selected to be safe and effective in supporting healthy aging of the body’s cells and organs.

settings.title: L-Biome
settings.subtitle: GUT HEALTH
settings.description: Dual-cap technology with fasting nutrition pre and probiotics, wrapped with vegan DHA.
settings.quick_view_description: Built to mimic the ProLon 5-Day post-fast microbiome, the L-Biome combines prebiotics, probiotics, and DHA, all in one daily capsule, thanks to advanced dual-cap technology. The prebiotics used are those present in ProLon’s 5-Day Fasting Nutrition, while the probiotics are those that flourish once the program is complete.

settings.title: L-Pill & L-Biome
settings.subtitle: DAILY HEALTHY AGING
settings.description: 30-day supply of L-Pill & L-Biome to support overall health and wellbeing.
settings.quick_view_description:
Healthy aging and gut health supplements developted by  leading Longevity scientists & doctors in collaboration with The Longevity Institute of The University of Southern California.

L-Pill supports the body’s sustained energy, brain health, cardiovascular health, immune health, cellular protection and healthy aging. 

L-Biome aims at flourishing a post-fasting gut health environment while supporting the healthy aging of different organs and systems.

settings.title: L-Protein
settings.subtitle: COMPLETE PROTEIN DRINK
settings.description: 25g complete protein shake. Perfect meal replacement and addition to your active lifestyle.

settings.title:
Slow Down Bioage & Age Gracefully

settings.subtitle: BUNDLE & SAVE
settings.description: Indulge your palate while embarking on a journey of transformation with the ProLon Chocolate Lovers Bundle. Thoughtfully curated for the discerning chocolate connoisseur.
settings.quick_view_description:
Indulge your palate while embarking on a journey of transformation with the ProLon Chocolate Lovers Bundle. Thoughtfully curated for the discerning chocolate connoisseur who does not want to compromise on taste while pursuing health and longevity, this bundle is a symphony of flavors that aligns with your wellness goals.
Whats Included ?

  • ProLon Chocolate Fasting Shake
  • ProLon Chocolate Chip Fasting Bar

settings.title: Quick Start Bundle
settings.subtitle: BUNDLE & SAVE
settings.description: Embark on your wellness journey with ease and simplicity with the ProLon Quick Start Bundle, your perfect introduction to the transformative world of fasting-mimicking nutrition.
settings.quick_view_description:
Embark on your wellness journey with ease and simplicity with the ProLon Quick Start Bundle, your perfect introduction to the transformative world of fasting-mimicking nutrition. Designed for those seeking to dip their toes into the health benefits of fasting without the long-term commitment, this bundle is a seamless blend of convenience and efficacy.
Whats Included ?
  • 1x ProLon 1-Day ReSet = 1 Days Intermittent Fasting Support
  • 1x ProLon Fasting Shake = 14 Days Intermittent Fasting Support
  • 1x ProLon Fasting Bar = 12 Days

settings.title: Healthy Holiday Bundle
settings.subtitle: BUNDLE & SAVE
settings.description: Celebrate the festive season with the gift of health using the ProLon Healthy Holiday Bundle, a specially curated collection to support your wellness journey through the indulgent times.
settings.quick_view_description:
Celebrate the festive season with the gift of health using the ProLon Healthy Holiday Bundle, a specially curated collection to support your wellness journey through the indulgent times. This bundle is tailored to maintain your healthy lifestyle amidst the holiday cheer by providing you 28 days of intermittent fast support.

Whats Included ?
  • 2x ProLon 1-Day ReSet = 2 Days Intermittent Fasting Support
  • 1x ProLon Fasting Shake = 14 Days Intermittent Fasting Support
  • 1x ProLon Fasting Bar = 12 Days

settings.title: Our 5-day nutrition program is the only program patented for promoting rejuvenation  from within for healthy aging.

settings.text: Discovered and developed at the Longevity Institute of the University of Southern California, our technology is plant-based nutrition that allows the body to enter into a beneficial fasting state without triggering the cells’ nutrient sensors. As the name suggests, it actually mimics fasting…while still allowing you to eat food. This nourished fasting fine-tunes cells, supports healthy aging, and eliminates the need to do a water-only starvation fast, which can have negative side effects. Take your body on a 5-day journey towards renewal.

settings.title: Transforming to a Fasting State
settings.subheading: The body transitions into a fasting state  & fat-burning mode so it can begin  cellular clean-up.

settings.title: Fat burning & Ketogenesis
settings.subheading: Fat-burning ramps up, contributing to the initiation  of ketogenesis (ketone production). By the end of  this day (48hrs), ketosis may occur.

settings.title: Autophagy / Clean-up State
settings.subheading: Cellular cleanup (autophagy) begins.  Fat-burning and ketone production/utilization  continues and increases.

settings.title: Cellular Rejuvenation
settings.subheading: Cellular cleaning/renewal & fat-burning continues. Your cells begin looking like younger versions of themselves. You're in the final stretch.

settings.title: Renewal & Change
settings.subheading: Fast completed, cellular renewal continues beyond day 5. Sustained cellular recycling, rejuvenation,  and renewal. Sustained ketosis may occur.

settings.title: Macro & micro precision nutrition keep you in a fasting state.
settings.text:
FMD is a nutrition program that contains a specific ratio, amount, and composition of plant-derived protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates.  The foods in the program nourish the body but do  not trigger the cellular food sensors known as nutrient-sensing pathways. In a nutshell, the program allows users to eat while their cells remain in a fasting state!

Each ingredient has been carefully selected, to work together to keep your body nourished during these five days. All ProLon ingredients are tested and selected.

settings.title: Trigger Autophagy - the magic of celluar rejuvenation.
settings.text:
Fasting, when done in a specific way, can trigger autophagy. Autophagy is a process in which the body cleans itself of tired, old cell parts and proteins, to make way for new, healthy ones. ProLon supports the body’s natural processes of intracellular clean-up and cell renewal.



During autophagy, cells recycle intracellular debris, and worn-out parts (organelles), so they appear to  be younger versions of themselves after the fast.

Autophagy is so important to health and longevity that research in the subject was awarded the 2016 Nobel Prize in Medicine. Simply put, autophagy is your body’s natural, too-often-untapped system for replacing and renewing old, worn out cellular components.

settings.heading: Clinically tested & proven to promote healthy aging.

settings.bdetail: IGF-1, a marker associated with aging and increased risk of cancer in mid-aged adults, was reduced by 13%.
Systolic blood pressure was reduced from  118 to 113.5 mm Hg (systolic).

settings.bdetailr: Weight loss came mostly from abdominal fat.  Participants lost an average of 5 lbs.
> 1-inch loss in waist circumference. While lean   mass was preserved.

settings.title: ProLon is Tested
settings.details: Our 5-day nutrition program is the only program patented for promoting rejuvenation from within for healthy aging.

settings.title: Micros and Macros
settings.description: FMD is a nutrition program that contains a specific ratio, amount, and composition of plant-derived protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates.  The foods in the program nourish the body but do  not trigger the cellular food sensors known as nutrient-sensing pathways. In a nutshell, the program allows users to eat while their cells remain in a fasting state!

Fasting, when done in a specific way, can trigger autophagy. Autophagy is a process in which the body cleans itself of tired, old cell parts and proteins, to make way for new, healthy ones. ProLon supports the body’s natural processes of intracellular clean-up and cell renewal.

During autophagy, cells recycle intracellular debris, and worn-out parts (organelles), so they appear to  be younger versions of themselves after the fast.

settings.tag: Dana- ProLon user
settings.title: I really enjoyed my ProLon experience
settings.description: The soups and bars were good and I learned a ton about myself and my eating habits. I tried ProLon to get rid of some inflammation in my body, and am very happy with the results. This feels like a great reset and I'm looking forward to a healthier future. I would do it again!

settings.testimonial: ProLon carries so many weight, metabolic and cellular benefits that not only do I recommend it, but I decided to join the company’s mission full time as Chief Medical Officer
settings.author: Dr. William Hsu, M.D

settings.testimonial: I love the science supporting ProLon, and I love that the science has been published in multiple peer reviewed journals. It allows me to suggest ProLon with confidence. I have used fasting and time restricted eating in my practice for years; ProLon augments this and takes it to the next level.
settings.author: Dr. Amy Savagian, MD

settings.testimonial: Not only do I recommend ProLon as a frequent nutritional intervention, I’ve done it myself numerous times. I love this product so much, I invested in the company
settings.author: Dr. Maria Tulpan, M.D.
